name: Patagonia Black Hole Cube - Unisex
description:
Stay organized on the road, on the trail or somewhere in between. The versatile Black Hole Cubes are made from a super-durable fabric and have internal compartments to keep things separated. Choose from 3 different sizes to solve all your storage dilemmas.Fabric is burly 300-denier recycled polyester ripstop (22% solution dyed) with a TPU film laminate and a DWR finish for water resistance.External daisy chain lets you lash them onto a pack.Large grab handle is glove-friendly.Plastic zipper sliders are corrosion resistant for use near salt water.Small size has a mesh internal pocket. Medium and large are divided into 2 mesh compartments with zippered openings.

        Sustainability
